messages.content: Hello CJ! How are things today?

Hey Zoe! Things are pretty active today. Looking at our support queue, we're handling 41 tickets total with 38 still open - mostly staying on top of the flow with our 3.2-hour average response time.

Here's what I'm seeing pattern-wise:

**Top Issues Today:**
• **Shipping** (15 tickets, 37%) - Lots of "where is my order" and delay questions
• **Account Management** (10 tickets, 24%) - Subscription upgrades and payment updates
• **Product Feedback** (8 tickets, 20%) - Recipe questions and product reviews

Our CSAT is holding steady at 4.3/5, which is solid. The shipping category is definitely our biggest volume driver at about 11 tickets per day - pretty typical for this time of year with Memorial Day weekend approaching.

Anything specific you want me to dive deeper into? I can pull detailed data on any of these categories or flag any customers that might need special attention.
